Class SMSDataModelList

  • java.lang.Object
    • SMSDataModelList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SMSDataModelInterface

    public class SMSDataModelList
extends java.lang.Object
implements SMSDataModelInterface
    This implementation of the SMSDataModelInterface works using both a LinkedList and an ArrayList. There is no limit to how many numbers can be added.

        Returns:
